Full Attack: Sting +4 melee (1d3–2 plus poison) and bite –1 melee (1)
Special Qualities: Blindsense 60 ft., darkvision 60 ft., immunity to sleep and paralysis, low-light vision, spell resistance 19, telepathy 60 ft.
Abilities: Str 6, Dex 15, Con 13, Int 10, Wis 12, Cha 10
Skills: Diplomacy +2, Hide +20*, Listen +7 +9, Search +6, Sense Motive +7, Spot +7 +9, Survival +1 (+3 following tracks)

Descripci\u00f3n: A pseudodragon has a body about 1 foot long, with a 2-foot tail. It weights about 7 pounds.A pseudodragon can communicate telepathically and can also vocalize animal noises.

Combate: A pseudodragon can deliver a vicious bite, but its principal weapon is its sting-equipped tail.Poison (Ex): Injury, Fortitude DC 14, initial damage sleep for 1 minute, secondary damage sleep for 1d3 hours. The save DC is Constitution-based and includes a +2 racial bonus.Blindsense (Ex): A pseudodragon can locate creatures within 60 feet by nonvisual means (mostly hearing and scent, but also by noticing vibration and other environmental clues). Opponents the pseudodragon can’t actually see still have total concealment against the pseudodragon.Telepathy (Su): Pseudodragons can communicate telepathically with creatures that speak Common or Sylvan, provided they are within 60 feet.Skills: Pseudodragons have a chameleonlike ability that grants them a +4 racial bonus on Hide checks. *In forests or overgrown areas, this bonus improves to +8.
